projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.alt: The front page of Alexander's personal portfolio website.
projects.description: This website showcases my work using semantic HTML and accessible design.

projects.title: Math Game
projects.alt: The game screen of a math game website that quizzes students on highschool math topics, like linear equations.
projects.description: An educational website game that quizzes students on highschool math topics, like linear equations.

projects.title: Interactive Lemon
projects.alt: An image of a whole lemon drawn in a computer.
projects.description: An interactive website that has a lemon which can be clicked on and also be moved around.

projects.title: Lemon Clicker
projects.alt: The game screen of a lemon clicking game.
projects.description: A clicking game where the objective is to click on the lemons shown on the screen as fast as you can.
